Package com.group09.playit.monteCarlo

Class Node

java.lang.Object
com.group09.playit.monteCarlo.Node
public class Node extends Object
This class represents a node in the MCTS tree It contains all the information needed to evaluate the node and run the MCTS algorithm.

    • rolloutBasic

      public int rolloutBasic()
      Rolls out the node by simulating a game. If there are no cards available we remove the node from the tree
      Returns:
      score of the rollout

      public Node select()

      minimum UCB1 score child
